title: how strict is the hostel in electronic city for 1st year
content: how strict is the hostel in electronic city for 1st year

comments.body: Yes please, people tell your experience, bcz I've seen the rules on paper and I'm TERRIFIED.

Bro chill all that papers rules are pure bs you just need to follow these: be in hostel before 7, come down and give your attendance by 7 don't be in others rooms after 10pm atleast don't get the warden's attention, don't look at phone while eating in the message , don't make too much noise in the mess that's it man everything else chill
do ppl go out on weekends and stuff? and is the 7pm curfew kinda limiting, or is it fine?
cant we use our phones after 11 pm
Hello yeah don't take the rules from the papers seriously, i still remember one of them was the warden could check the phones anytime
Weekend or any day just be inn by 7pm ask warden if any emergency or any reason
